title: For several years, as one of Mobutu’s closest collaborators, Karl-I-Bond held some of the most important and sensitive posts in Zaire: 1972–74, foreign minister; 1974–77, secretary-general of the M.P.R
In between offices he was convicted and jailed for some time for treason and was on exile in Belgium before returning to Zaire in the early 1980s
